scenarios.title: Basic Advanced Persistent Threat Response - Large Enterprise
scenarios.incident: Security team detected unusual network traffic patterns suggesting APT activity. Multiple systems showing signs of compromise.
scenarios.analysis: Indicators include: lateral movement, data exfiltration attempts, persistence mechanisms, command and control communications.
scenarios.response: Immediate containment, forensic analysis, threat hunting, indicators of compromise (IoC) development, remediation planning.
scenarios.expert_notes: Assume breach mentality - design for containment and detection.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Security is a process, not a product - continuous improvement is essential.

scenarios.title: Expert-Level Zero Trust Implementation Strategy - Medium Enterprise
scenarios.challenge: Organization needs to implement zero trust architecture replacing traditional perimeter-based security model.
scenarios.approach: Identity verification, device trust, least privilege access, micro-segmentation, continuous monitoring, policy enforcement.
scenarios.implementation: Deploy identity management system, implement network access control, establish policy engine, integrate monitoring tools.
scenarios.expert_notes: Assume breach mentality - design for containment and detection.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Security is a process, not a product - continuous improvement is essential.

scenarios.title: Basic Cloud Security Posture Assessment - Large Enterprise
scenarios.scenario: Multi-cloud environment requires security assessment and compliance validation across AWS, Azure, and GCP platforms.
scenarios.evaluation: Configuration assessment, access control review, data protection analysis, compliance gap identification, risk prioritization.
scenarios.remediation: Implement cloud security frameworks, automate compliance monitoring, establish governance policies, enhance logging.
scenarios.expert_notes: Assume breach mentality - design for containment and detection.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Security is a process, not a product - continuous improvement is essential.
